welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hull, USA! We are thrilled to have you here in our charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and welcoming community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hull has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Air Canada, Delta, Southwest, and Sun Country Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, United, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by Aer Lingus, Air France, British Airways, and Lufthansa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport is dedicated to handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
